Class CoreAdkComponentProvider

java.lang.Object
com.google.adk.utils.CoreAdkComponentProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdkComponentProvider
public class CoreAdkComponentProvider extends Object implements AdkComponentProvider
Provides ADK components that are part of core.

    List<Class<? extends BaseAgent>>

    Returns tool classes for AgentTool, LongRunningFunctionTool and ExampleTool.

    Returns tool instances for LoadArtifactsTool, ExitLoopTool and UrlContextTool.
